archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1455
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want to provide an onboarding journey the first time a customer engages with Vodafone Rewards through the mobile app, to ensure they know how to get around and make the most of rewards

properties.value: [CLM] Onboarding to loyalty can be made a separate process, to be agreed during analysis Standard customer onboarding process?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
